Person's name or surname cannot have more than 50 chars
Person must have position

testsuite.name: ProjectServiceSpec

testcase.name: Create project with priority greater than number of projects
Create project with priority value (1) which is currently used
Create project with priority value (3) which is currently used
Update project with priority value greater than number of projects
Update project with priority(1) value which is currently used(2)
Update projects with priority(1) value which is currently used(1)
Fix gaps in priority values after deletion of the project in the middle
Fix gaps in priority values after deletion of the project with priority 1
Remove the last element.
List of the projects should be ordered by priorities

testsuite.system-out: --Output from Create project with priority greater than number of projects-- --Output from Create project with priority value (1) which is currently used-- --Output from Create project with priority value (3) which is currently used-- --Output from Update project with priority value greater than number of projects-- --Output from Update project with priority(1) value which is currently used(2)-- --Output from Update projects with priority(1) value which is currently used(1)-- --Output from Fix gaps in priority values after deletion of the project in the middle-- --Output from Fix gaps in priority values after deletion of the project with priority 1-- --Output from Remove the last element.-- --Output from List of the projects should be ordered by priorities--
testsuite.system-err: --Output from Create project with priority greater than number of projects-- --Output from Create project with priority value (1) which is currently used-- --Output from Create project with priority value (3) which is currently used-- --Output from Update project with priority value greater than number of projects-- --Output from Update project with priority(1) value which is currently used(2)-- --Output from Update projects with priority(1) value which is currently used(1)-- --Output from Fix gaps in priority values after deletion of the project in the middle-- --Output from Fix gaps in priority values after deletion of the project with priority 1-- --Output from Remove the last element.-- --Output from List of the projects should be ordered by priorities--

testsuite.name: ProjectSpec

testcase.name: Project name cannot be null or blank
Project name must be alphanumeric
Project code cannot be null or blank
Project code must be alphanumeric
Priority cannot be lower than number 1

testsuite.system-out: --Output from Project name cannot be null or blank-- --Output from Project name must be alphanumeric-- --Output from Project code cannot be null or blank-- --Output from Project code must be alphanumeric-- --Output from Priority cannot be lower than number 1--
testsuite.system-err: --Output from Project name cannot be null or blank-- --Output from Project name must be alphanumeric-- --Output from Project code cannot be null or blank-- --Output from Project code must be alphanumeric-- --Output from Priority cannot be lower than number 1--
